column2: UPDATE 1-BP tells court it did not dither in response to U.S. Gulf spillBP's well control exec says was unprepared for U.S. Gulf blowoutUPDATE 1-BP's well control exec says he was unprepared for U.S. Gulf blowout NEW ORLEANS
column3: Oct 2 BP's manager in charge of controlling the Macondo blowout in 2010 was never trained to permanently plug a ruptured oil well and said in court on Wednesday the British company was not fully prepared for the worst offshore oil spill in U.S. history. column3: NYSE get nod from Euronext regulators on merger NEW YORK
column4: Oct 2 IntercontinentalExchange Inc  and NYSE Euronext said on Wednesday they moved a step closer to ICE finalizing its proposed takeover of the Big Board operator after a European regulatory group said it would not object to the deal.
